logging.httpError: call to C.M.I. was not successful:

status.cmiError1: the CAN node is not available / does not send data
status.cmiError2: Failure during the CAN-request/parameter not available for this device
status.cmiError3: Syntax error in the request String
status.cmiError4: too many requests to C.M.I. (max 1 per min allowed)
status.cmiError6: too few arguments - jsonnode or jsonparam not set
status.cmiError7: CAN bus is busy - check if error persits
status.cmiError: genarl Error in C.M.I. (siehe 'flow editor debug tab' f√ºr Details)
status.httpErrorHost: wrong hostname / IP or C.M.I. not reachable
status.GCSError: no live data requested but data in global context store not found

label.name: Description
label.skip1: Outputs, if the value hasn't changed
label.severity3: that a value is not considered to have changed.
label.temp2: values if the deviation from the last

tips.tip1: Every C.M.I. from which you want to read out data must be created only once.
tips.tip2: You can (but do not have to) use the same name as the description you selected when you defined it in X2 data logging.
